name: clessidera
short_description: The idea is to build an email archive system for lazy people ... like me ;-). At first you can move messages by date in a dedicated mailbox on-line. Or archive messages in compressed format to be stored somewhere. The compressed archive is indexed to be searchable and recoverable if needed. This project is in early stages of development (near 1.0 in the road map). See FEATURES for details and version road map. It works with an IMAP server, and it has been tested on Linux Slackware 13.0 32 bit and dovecot-2.0.0
summary: A simple archive system for emails
